meanings.definition: Capable of being stretched or extended.
meanings.sent1: The rubber band was very stretchy and could be pulled far.
meanings.sent2: The yoga pants were made of a stretchy material that allowed for easy movement.
meanings.sent3: The stretchy balloon made funny noises as it was being blown up.
meanings.sent4: Her imagination was as stretchy as a rubber band, coming up with new ideas constantly.
meanings.sent5: The elastic in the waistband was so stretchy that it seemed to never lose its shape.

meanings.definition: Having the ability to stretch or be stretched.
meanings.sent1: The fabric was very stretchy, allowing it to be pulled in all directions.
meanings.sent2: The cat's stretchy body enabled it to fit into tight spaces easily.
meanings.sent3: The stretchy toy snake could be twisted and turned in various ways.
meanings.sent4: His patience was as stretchy as a rubber band, always able to handle more.
meanings.sent5: The balloon animal artist created a stretchy giraffe that could be twisted into different shapes.

meanings.definition: Able to stretch easily without breaking.
meanings.sent1: The bubblegum was so stretchy that it could be pulled into long strands.
meanings.sent2: The slime was incredibly stretchy, allowing it to be molded into different shapes.
meanings.sent3: The stretchy cheese on the pizza made for a gooey and delicious bite.
meanings.sent4: Her resilience was as stretchy as a rubber band, bouncing back from challenges.
meanings.sent5: The taffy was so stretchy that it could be pulled and twisted into intricate designs.
